content:
Vladamir is adjusting his diet to prepare for his next bodybuilding competition.  Last week, he consumed $500$ grams of protein.  This week, he wants to at least double last week's protein consumption by eating just eggs and chicken breasts. Each egg has $8$ grams of protein, and each chicken breast has $25$ grams of protein.

**Write an *inequality* that represents the number of eggs $(E)$ and chicken breasts $(C)$ Vladamir will need to eat to achieve his protein goal.**

[[☃ expression 1]]

**Graph the constraint equation with $C$ on the horizontal axis and $E$ on the vertical axis.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]

**If Vladamir eats $35$ eggs $(E)$, which of the following numbers of chicken breasts $(C)$ can he eat to meet or exceed his protein goal?** 

[[☃ radio 1]]
